Package kdl.prox.qgraph2

Interface Summary
AbsQueryChild The interface that is implemented by classes that can be containted by an AbstractQuery: QGItem (QGVertex and QGEdge), QGConstraint, and Subquery.
QueryIterHandler Used by QueryIterator to "walk" QueryS.
 

Class Summary
AbstractQuery Abstract superclass to Query and Subquery.
Annotation Represents a numeric annotation, either on a QGItem (QGVertex or QGEdge), or on an AbstractQuery.
ConsQGVertex A special type of QGVertex that has been consolidated, i.e.
EditorQueryIterator Title: Editor Query Iterator Description: A query editor which completes subqueries before edges in order to properly draw edges in yFiles which require all nodes to be present before any edges are drawn.
QGAddLink An update edge from a QGraph query.
QGConstraint Represents one constraint from the list of possibly many constraints in a QGQuery.
QGEdge Helper class that represents a graph query edge.
QGItem Abstract superclass to QGEdge and QGVertex, defines useful IVs and methods.
QGVertex Helper class that represents a graph query vertex.
Query A concrete query class.
QueryGraph2CompOp A concrete subclass that executes graph query specified by the input element.
QueryIterator A Utility that simplifies recursively "walking" through a Query.
QueryIterHandlerEmptyAdapter Implements an empty handler for a QueryIterHandler Anonymous handles overload methods that they need.
QueryValidator A helper class used by QueryGraph2CompOp to validate newly-created QueryS.
QueryXMLUtil Provides functionality to translate a Query into XML.
QueryXMLUtil.QueryToXMLHandler Handler that generates XML from a Query.
Subquery A concrete subquery class.
TempTableMgr Helper class instantiated by QueryGraph2CompOp.execTGPath() and used by Transformation instances to manage the mapping of ConsQGVertex names to temporary SGI NSTs.
TFMGraph Represents a transformation graph, i.e., the result of applying all applicable Transformations to an initial Query until a final node is converged on.
TGEdge Represents an edge in a TFMGraph.
TGItem The abstract superclass to TGEdge and TGVertex.
TGPath Represents a particular path through a transformation graph, i.e., an ordered list of Transformations from the initial Query to a final result.
TGVertex Represents nodes in a TFMGraph.
 

Error Summary
QGValidationError Error subclass used by QueryValidator.
